title: Cement prices increased from Monday (25)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Cement prices were increased with effect from midnight on Monday (25).
The price of a bag of imported cement was increased by Rs.500/-, and the new price of a bag of imported Cement is Rs. 2,850/-.
The price of a bag of local cement has also been increased by Rs.400/- from midnight yesterday.
